local name = "" local time = "" if matches[4] then time = matches[3].. "hr " ..matches[4].. "min" else time = matches[3].. "min" end
if matches[2] == "intelligence" then name = "Int" elseif matches[2] == "strength" then name = "Str" elseif matches[2] == "dexterity" then name = "Dex" elseif matches[2] == "constitution" then name = "Con" elseif matches[2] == "critical" then return end
if def.table.item.ogre then def.table.item.ogre[#def.table.item.ogre + 1] = name def.table.item.ogre[#def.table.item.ogre + 1] = time else def.table.item.ogre = {name, time} end
deleteLine()

Script.name: Init
Script.script:
def = def or {table = {}, skills = {}} function def.load() local currentdir = lfs.currentdir() if lfs.chdir(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences") == nil then lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences") end if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences/skills.lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences/skills.lua", def.skills) def.archetype() def.tables() else cecho("\nNo saved skills found, please wait a moment while skills are gathered") def.dont_ask = true def.skills_create() end lfs.chdir(currentdir) end
function def.save() local currentdir = lfs.currentdir() if lfs.chdir(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences") == nil then lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences") end table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/Defences/skills.lua", def.skills) lfs.chdir(currentdir) end
function def.skills_create() display(def.dont_ask) def.skill_checking = true for num in pairs(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups) do local stuff = yajl.to_string({group=gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[num]["name"]}) local string = "Char.Skills.Get "..stuff.."" sendGMCP(string) gagPrompt = true end send("\n", false) tempTimer(2, [[def.skill_checking = false]]) tempTimer(2, [[def.archetype()]]) tempTimer(3, [[def.tables();def.dont_ask = false]]) tempTimer(3, [[cecho("\n<white>If any of your skills are not transcendent, please use <green>def <skill> set <name of highest ability><white> for each one.")]]) end
function def.skill_ab() local dontask = {"tattoos","riding","attainment","dragoncraft","sculpting","pervasion","duress","ignition"} if def.skill_checking then local name = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.group if def.skill_override then def.skills[name] = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list elseif def.skills[name] then def.skills[name] = def.skills[name] else def.skills[name] = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list if not table.contains(dont_ask, name) and not def.dont_ask then cecho("\n<white>New skill found, "..name..". If you are not transcendent, please use <green>def "..name.." set <name of highest ability><white>.") end def.save() end end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Skills.List", "def.skill_ab")
function def.adjust_skills(skill, ab) if not def.skills[skill] then cecho("No skill called <green>"..string.title(skill).."<white> found") elseif not table.contains(def.skills[skill], ab) then cecho("<white>No ability in <green>"..string.title(skill).."<white> called <green>"..ab.."<white> found") else local stop = table.index_of(def.skills[skill], ab) local start = #def.skills[skill] while start > stop do table.remove(def.skills[skill], start) start = start - 1 end cecho("<white>Highest <green>"..string.title(skill).."<white> ability set to <green>"..ab) def.save() end end

Script.name: defs
Script.script:
def = def or {table = {}, skills = {}}
function def.show() def.archetype() if def.day == nil then send("time raw") end
if def.class == "Knight" then def.knight() if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Runewarden" then def.runes() elseif gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Priest" then
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Infernal" then
end end
if def.class == "Elemental" then def.elementalLord() end
if def.class == "Magi" then def.magi() def.channels() end
if def.class == "Priest" then def.priest() end
if def.class == "Forestal" then def.forestal() end
if def.class == "Blademaster" then def.blademaster() end
if def.class == "Dragon" then def.dragon() end
if def.class == "Shaman" then def.shaman() def.spirits() end
def.tattoos() def.survival() def.vision() def.consume() if gmcp.Char.Status.class ~= "Runewarden" then def.runes() end if table.size(def.table.item) > 0 then def.items() end def.other() end
function def.spacer() if def.num == 3 then def.num = 0 echo("\n ") end def.num = def.num + 1 end
function def.yes(name) def.spacer() local str = string.gsub(name,"<%w+>","") if string.len(str) > 18 then name = string.cut(name, 40) cecho("<white>[<green>X<white>] "..string.format("%-40s",name)) if def.num ~= 3 then def.spacer() end else if string.len(str) < string.len(name) then local num = string.len(name) - string.len(str) cecho("<white>[<green>X<white>] "..string.format("%-"..(18+num).."s",name)) else cecho("<white>[<green>X<white>] "..string.format("%-18s",name)) end end end
function def.mana(name) def.spacer() local str = string.gsub(name,"<%w+>","") if string.len(str) > 18 then name = string.cut(name, 40) cecho("<white>[<green>M<white>] "..string.format("%-40s",name)) if def.num ~= 3 then def.spacer() end else if string.len(str) < string.len(name) then local num = string.len(name) - string.len(str) cecho("<white>[<green>M<white>] "..string.format("%-"..(18+num).."s",name)) else cecho("<white>[<green>M<white>] "..string.format("%-18s",name)) end end end
function def.no(name) def.spacer() local str = string.gsub(name,"<%w+>","") if string.len(str) > 18 then name = string.cut(name, 40) cecho("<white>[ ] "..string.format("%-40s",name)) if def.num ~= 3 then def.spacer() end else if string.len(str) < string.len(name) then local num = string.len(name) - string.len(str) cecho("<white>[ ] "..string.format("%-"..(18+num).."s",name)) else cecho("<white>[ ] "..string.format("%-18s",name)) end end end
function def.dormant(name) def.spacer() local str = string.gsub(name,"<%w+>","") if string.len(str) > 18 then name = string.cut(name, 40) cecho("<white>[<yellow>X<white>] "..string.format("%-40s",name)) if def.num ~= 3 then def.spacer() end else if string.len(str) < string.len(name) then local num = string.len(name) - string.len(str) cecho("<white>[<yellow>X<white>] "..string.format("%-"..(18+num).."s",name)) else cecho("<white>[<yellow>X<white>] "..string.format("%-18s",name)) end end end

ScriptGroup.name: Primary
ScriptGroup.script: --Aquachemantics, Wildewood --Transmology needs more fleshform lines --Harmonics crystalplex needs testing

Script.name: Nature
Script.script: function def.nature() cecho("\n<green>Nature") if def.skills.wicca then cecho("<green> (Wicca)") elseif def.skills.druid then cecho("<green> (Druidry)") elseif def.skills.wildewood then cecho("<green> (Wildewood)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3 if table.contains(def.skills.nature, "Blend") then if def.table.nature.blend then def.yes("Blend") else def.no("Blend") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nature, "Barkskin") then if def.table.nature.barkskin then def.yes("Barkskin") else def.no("Barkskin") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nature, "Rooting") then if def.table.nature.rooting then def.yes("Rooting") else def.no("Rooting") end end if def.skills.wicca then def.wicca() elseif def.skills.druidry then def.druid() elseif def.skills.wildewood then def.wildewood() end end

Script.name: Elementalism
Script.script:
function def.element() cecho("\n<green>Elementalism") if def.skills.aquamancy then cecho("<green> (<blue>Aquamancy<green>)") end if def.skills.geomancy then cecho("<green> (<firebrick>Geomancy<green>)") end if def.skills.pyromancy then cecho("<green> (<red>Pyromancy<green>)") end if def.skills.aeromancy then cecho("<green> (<white>Aeromancy<green>)") end if def.skills.aerochemantics then cecho("<green> (<white>Aerochemantics<green>)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3 if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Levitate") then if def.table.enchantments.levitate then def.yes("Levitate") else def.no("Levitate") end end if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Stoneskin") then if def.table.element.stoneskin then def.yes("Stoneskin") else def.no("Stoneskin") end end if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Waterbreathe") then if def.table.enchantments.waterbreathe then def.yes("Waterbreathe") else def.no("Waterbreathe") end end if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Elementshield") then if def.table.element.shield then def.yes("Elementshield") else def.no("Elementshield") end end if def.skills.aeromancy then if table.contains(def.skills.aeromancy, "Windwalk") then if def.table.element.windwalk then def.yes("Windwalk") else def.no("Windwalk") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeromancy, "Staff") then if def.table.element.nimbus then def.yes("Nimbus") else def.no("Nimbus") end end end
if def.skills.aerochemantics then if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "WindWalk") then if def.table.element.windwalk then def.yes("Windwalk") else def.no("Windwalk") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Conductive") then if def.table.element.conductive then def.yes("Conductive ("..def.table.element.conductive..")") else def.no("Conductive") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Ionic") then if def.table.element.ionic then def.yes("Ionic Cloud ("..def.table.element.ionic..")") else def.no("Ionic Cloud") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Insulation") then if def.table.element.insul then def.yes("Insulation ("..def.table.element.insul..")") else def.no("Insulation") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Antigravity") then if def.table.element.antigrav then def.yes("Antigravity ("..def.table.element.antigrav..")") else def.no("Antigravity") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Dynomatic") then if def.table.element.dynomatic then def.yes("Dynomatic ("..def.table.element.dynomatic..")") else def.no("Dynomatic") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Force") then if def.table.element.force then def.yes("Force Generator ("..def.table.element.force..")") else def.no("Force Generator") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Electromagnetic") then if def.table.element.electromagnetic then def.yes("Electromagnetic ("..def.table.element.electromagnetic..")") else def.no("Electromagnetic") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Positronic") then if def.table.element.positronic then def.yes("Positronic ("..def.table.element.positronic..")") else def.no("Positronic") end end end
if def.skills.aquamancy then if table.contains(def.skills.aquamancy, "Staff") then if def.table.element.watershield then def.yes("Watershield") else def.no("Watershield") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquamancy, "Whirlpool") then if def.table.element.whirlpool then def.yes("Whirlpool") else def.no("Whirlpool") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquamancy, "LiquidForm") then if def.table.element.liquidform then def.yes("Liquid Form") else def.no("Liquid Form") end end end
if def.skills.geomancy then if table.contains(def.skills.geomancy, "Staff") then if def.table.element.attune then def.yes("Attune") else def.no("Attune") end end end
if def.skills.pyromancy then if table.contains(def.skills.pyromancy, "Fireproof") then if def.table.element.fireproof then def.yes("Fireproof") else def.no("Fireproof") end end if table.contains(def.skills.pyromancy, "Flamering") then if def.table.element.flamering then def.yes("Flamering") else def.no("Flamering") end end end
end

Script.name: Rituals
Script.script:
function def.rituals() cecho("\n<green>Rituals") if def.skills.sacraments then cecho("<green> (<white>Sacraments<green>)") end if def.skills.necromancy then cecho("<green> (<firebrick>Necromancy<green>)") end if def.skills.paradigmatics then cecho("<green> (<orange>Paradigmatics<green>)") end if def.skills.aeonics then cecho("<green> (<yellow>Aeonics<green>:)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3
if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Fortuna") then if def.table.ritual.fortuna then def.yes("Fortuna") else def.no("Fortuna") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Draconis") then if def.table.ritual.draconis then def.yes("Draconis") else def.no("Draconis") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Populus") then if def.table.ritual.populus then def.yes("Populus") else def.no("Populus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Acquisitio") then if def.table.enchantments.acquisitio then def.yes("Acquisitio") else def.no("Acquisitio") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Rubeus") then if def.table.ritual.rubeus then def.yes("Rubeus") else def.no("Rubeus") end end
if def.table.construct.active then def.yes(def.table.construct.name) end
if def.skills.sacraments then if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Benediction") then if def.table.other.fitness and def.table.other.purity and def.table.other.constitution then def.yes("Benediction") def.table.other.fitness = nil def.table.other.purity = nil def.table.other.constitution = nil else def.no("Benediction") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Fervor") then if def.table.ritual.fervor then def.yes("Fervor") else def.no("Fervor") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Honour") then if def.table.ritual.honour then def.yes("Honour") else def.no("Honour") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Numen") then if def.table.ritual.numen then def.yes("Numen") else def.no("Numen") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Trueheal") then if def.table.other.barrier then def.yes("Prismatic Barrier") else def.no("Prismatic Barrier") end end end if def.skills.necromancy then if table.contains(def.skills.necromancy, "Putrefaction") then if def.table.ritual.putrefaction then def.yes("Putrefaction") else def.no("Putrefaction") end end if table.contains(def.skills.necromancy, "Ghost") then if def.table.ritual.ghost then def.yes("Ghost") else def.no("Ghost") end end if table.contains(def.skills.necromancy, "Lichdom") then if def.table.ritual.seed then def.yes("Lich Seed") elseif def.table.ritual.lich then def.yes("Lichdom")
if def.table.ritual.cold then def.yes("Cold Aura") else def.no("Cold Aura") end else def.no("Lich Seed") end if def.table.construct.active then if def.table.construct.adroit then def.yes("Adroitness") else def.no("Adroitness") end if def.table.construct.bloodrage then def.yes("Bloodrage") else def.no("Bloodrage") end end end end
if def.skills.paradigmatics then if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "ChaoteSign") or def.table.construct.name == "Third Eye" then if def.table.ritual.chaotesign then def.yes("Chaote Sign") else def.no("Chaote Sign") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "GoodLuck") then if def.table.ritual.goodluck then def.yes("Good Luck") else def.no("Good Luck") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Polarity") then if def.table.ritual.polarity then def.yes("Polarity") else def.no("Polarity") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Gnosis") then if def.table.ritual.gnosis then def.yes("Gnosis") else def.no("Gnosis") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Fusion") then if def.table.ritual.fusion then def.yes("Fusion") else def.no("Fusion") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Butterfly") or def.table.construct.name == "Third Eye" then if def.table.ritual.butterfly then def.yes("Butterfly") else def.no("Butterfly") end end end
if def.skills.aeonics then if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "MindClock") or def.table.construct.name == "Time Sense" then if def.table.ritual.mindclock then def.yes("Mind Clock") else def.no("Mind Clock") end end if def.table.construct == "Time Sense" then if deftable.construct.quick then def.yes("Quickening") else def.no("Quickening") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "Insight") then if def.table.ritual.insight then def.yes("Insight") else def.no("Insight") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "TimelessBody") then if def.table.ritual.timeless then def.yes("Timeless Body") else def.no("Timeless Body") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "Alacrity") then if def.table.ritual.alacrity then def.yes("Alacrity") else def.no("Alacrity") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "FutureGlimpse") then if def.table.ritual.glimpse then def.yes("Future Glimpse") else def.no("Future Glimpse") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "SwitchFate") then if def.table.ritual.fate then def.yes("Switch Fate") else def.no("Switch Fate") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "AeonField") then if def.table.ritual.aeonfield then def.yes("Aeon Field") else def.no("Aeon Field") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "Foresight") then if def.table.ritual.foresight then def.yes("Foresight") else def.no("Foresight") end end end def.table.construct.active = false end

Script.name: knights
Script.script:
function def.knight() cecho("\n<green>Knight")
for k,v in pairs(gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats) do if string.find(gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[k], "Spec:") then local str = utf8.remove(gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[k],0, 6) cecho(" <green>(<white>"..str.."<green>)") end end cecho("<white>:") def.num = 3
if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Weathering") then if def.table.knight.weather then def.yes("Weathering") else def.no("Weathering") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Block") then if def.table.knight.block then def.yes("Blocking (<green>"..def.table.knight.block.."<white>)") else def.no("Blocking") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Gripping") then if def.table.knight.grip then def.yes("Gripping") else def.no("Gripping") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Sturdiness") then if def.table.knight.firm then def.yes("Standing Firm") else def.no("Sturdiness") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Resistance") then if def.table.knight.resistance then def.yes("Resistance") else def.no("Resistance") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Defend") then if def.table.knight.engage then def.yes("Defending (<green>"..def.table.knight.defend.."<white>)") else def.no("Defend") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Engage") then if def.table.knight.engage then def.yes("Engage (<green>"..def.table.knight.engage.."<white>)") else def.no("Engage") end end if table.contains(def.skills.chivalry, "Fury") then if def.table.knight.fury then def.yes("Fury (<green>"..math.floor(math.floor(getStopWatchTime(def.furyTimer))/-60).."mins<white>)") elseif def.furyTimer then def.no("Fury (<green>"..math.floor(math.floor(getStopWatchTime(def.furyTimer))/-60).."mins<white>)") else def.no("Fury") end end --Dual Cutting if table.contains(def.skills.weaponmastery, "Mastery") then if def.table.knight.mastery then def.yes("Mastery") else def.no("Mastery") end end --Two Handed if table.contains(def.skills.weaponmastery, "Deflect") then if def.table.knight.deflect then def.yes("Deflect") else def.no("Deflect") end end --Devotion if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Paladin" and table.contains(def.skills.devotion, "Inspiration") then if def.table.knight.inspire then def.yes("Inspiration") else def.no("Inspiration") end end --Weaponry if table.contains(def.skills.weaponry, "Targeting") then if def.table.other.target then def.yes("Target (<green>"..def.table.other.target.."<white>)") else def.no("Target") end end if table.contains(def.skills.weaponry, "Parrying") then if def.table.other.parry then def.yes("Parry (<green>"..def.table.other.parry.."<white>)") else def.no("Parry") end end
end

"F" end if def.table.channels.air.bind then name = name .. "B" end if table.size(def.table.channels.earth) > 0 then name = name .."<white>)" end def.yes(name) else def.no("Earth") end if def.class == "Magi" then if def.table.channels.fire then local name = "Fire" if table.size(def.table.channels.fire) > 0 then name = name .." Script.name: Archetype finder
Script.script:
function def.archetype()
if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Runewarden" or gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Infernal" or gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Paladin" then def.class = "Knight" elseif string.find(gmcp.Char.Status.class, "Elemental") then def.class = "Elemental" elseif string.find(gmcp.Char.Status.class, "Dragon") then def.class = "Dragon" elseif gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Druid" or gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Sylvan" or gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Sentinel" then def.class = "Forestal" else def.class = gmcp.Char.Status.class end
end
function def.grab_new() def.skill_checking = true if def.class == "Knight" then if not def.skills.chivalry then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"chivalry"}]]) end if not def.skills.weaponmastery then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"weaponmastery"}]]) end if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Runewarden" and not def.skills.runelore then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"runelore"}]]) end if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Infernal" and not def.skills.runelore then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"runelore"}]]) end if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Paladin" and not def.skills.oppression then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"oppression"}]]) end elseif def.class == "Elemental" then if string.find(gmcp.Char.Status.class, "earth") and not def.skills.sculpting then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"sculpting"}]]) elseif string.find(gmcp.Char.Status.class, "water") and not def.skills.pervasion then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"pervasion"}]]) elseif string.find(gmcp.Char.Status.class, "air") and not def.skills.duress then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"duress"}]]) elseif string.find(gmcp.Char.Status.class, "fire") and not def.skills.ignition then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"ignition"}]]) end elseif def.class == "Dragon" then if not def.skills.dragoncraft then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"dragoncraft"}]]) end elseif def.class == "Forestal" then if (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Druid" or gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Sylvan") and not def.skills.groves then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"groves"}]]) end if (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Druid" or gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Sentinel") and not def.skills.metamorphosis then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"metamorphosis"}]]) end if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Sentinel" then if not def.skills.woodlore then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"woodlore"}]]) end if not def.skills.skirmishing then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"skirmishing"}]]) end end if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Druid" and not def.skills.reclamation then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"reclamation"}]]) end if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Sylvan" then if not def.skills.propagation then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"propagation"}]]) end if not def.skills.weatherweaving then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"weatherweaving"}]]) end end elseif def.class == "Magi" then if not def.skills.elementalism then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"elementalism"}]]) end if not def.skills.crystalism then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"crystalism"}]]) end if not def.skills.artificing then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"artificing"}]]) end elseif def.class == "Priest" then if not def.skills.devotion then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"devotion"}]]) end if not def.skills.spirituality then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"spirituality"}]]) end if not def.skills.zeal then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"zeal"}]]) end elseif def.class == "Blademaster" then if not def.skills.twoarts then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"twoarts"}]]) end if not def.skills.striking then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"striking"}]]) end if not def.skills.shindo then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"shindo"}]]) end elseif def.class == "Shaman" then if not def.skills.spiritlore then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"spiritlore"}]]) end if not def.skills.curses then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"curses"}]]) end if not def.skills.vodun then sendGMCP([[Char.Skills.Get {"group":"vodun"}]]) end else cecho(def.class.." has not yet been implemented.") end send("\n") tempTimer(3, [[def.skill_checking = false]]) end

Script.name: create def tables
clear ents
Script.script:
function def.clearents() if def.skills.wicca then def.table.wicca = {} end if def.skills.transmology then def.table.transm.spix = nil def.table.transm.ribbachi = nil def.table.transm.sludgeworm = nil def.table.transm.morrible = nil def.table.transm.hekoskeri = nil def.table.transm.homunculus = nil end
end
